com.github.valid8j.pcond.core.refl

Enum ReflUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<ReflUtils>
      • com.github.valid8j.pcond.core.refl.ReflUtils
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Comparable<ReflUtils>

    public enum ReflUtils
extends Enum<ReflUtils>

    This class consists of static utility methods for creating printable functions and predicate on objects.

        public static ReflUtils valueOf(String name)

        Parameters:

      • invokeMethod

        public static <R> R invokeMethod(MethodQuery methodQuery)

        Invokes a method found by methodQuery. All parameters in the query needs to be bound before calling this method. When a query matches no or more than one methods, an exception will be thrown.

        If an exception is thrown by the method, it will be wrapped by RuntimeException and re-thrown.

        Type Parameters:
        R - Type of the returned value.
        Parameters:
        methodQuery - A query that speficies the method to be executed.
        Returns:
        The value returned from the method found by the query.
        See Also:
        MethodQuery, findMethod(Class, String, Object[])

      • invokeMethod

        public static <R> R invokeMethod(Method method,
                                 Object obj,
                                 Object[] arguments)

        Invokes a given method on the object with arguments passed as obj and arguments.

        Type Parameters:
        R - The type of the value returned from the method.
        Parameters:
        method - A method to be invoked.
        obj - An object on which the method is invoked.
        arguments - Arguments passed to the method.
        Returns:
        The value returned by method.

      • findMethod

        public static Method findMethod(Class<?> aClass,
                                String methodName,
                                Object[] args)

        Tries to find a method whose name is methodName from a given class aClass and that can be invoked with parameter values args.

        Unless one and only one method is found appropriate, an exception will be thrown.

        In this version, boxing/unboxing and casting are not attempted to determine the methodto be returned during the search. This means, if there are overloaded methods of the methodName that can be invoked with args, this method will fail. Also even if there is a method of the methodName that can be invoked if boxing/unboxing happens, this method will fail.

        Parameters:
        aClass - A class from which the method is searched.
        methodName - A name of the method
        args - Arguments which should be given to the method
        Returns:
        A method for given class aClass, method, and args.

      • createCombinerForMethodList

        public static BinaryOperator<List<Method>> createCombinerForMethodList()

        This method is made public in order only for unit testing since with Java 8, the combiner returned by this method will never be used. - Can a Collector’s combiner function ever be used on sequential streams?

        Returns:
        A combiner for method list.
